ṭaiyār śrīkāryamatikārikaḷ maturāntaka muventa-veḷārum tiruviṭaimarutuṭaiyār tevaka
sabhainampirāṭṭiyār gomuyārkkkāy tiruviṭaimarutuṭaiyārkkku kaṇkāṇi kaṇakku uṭaiyanampi na
mpiyaluyār koyililkkūṭattey iruntu uṭaiyār tiruvōlakkamāy irukkat teciypāṭṭum kaśyapaṉ kaṇṭa
naḻupaṇaitevanukku ivaṉ teciy paṭa teciy pāṭuvataṟku muṉ kalveṭṭiṉa nilam ivaṉ eḻupaṇai tevaṉukkum ivaṉ anvayattārkkum
vaḻivaḻi candrādittaval ivanukku veli nilam nivantam ceytu kuṭukka veṉṟu evalāl ivaṉukku nivantañ ceyta nilamāvatu uṭaiyār tevaka
ṉmi veṇṇāṭuṅkuṭic coṟuṭaiyāṉpattu uḷḷiṭṭa veliyum innilam veliyum ivaṉātal ivaṉ anvayattār ātal oruvaṉey teciya pātiyu

nalluḻānkoṇṭamunṟumāvumṉaiccu kura lum nāṉ vilai koṇṭa iruvelicceyyum tiruviṭaimarutil śrīmūlastha
ivvūr nān eṭuppitta śrīkoyilkaḷukkukuṭutten

viṭai-marutuṭaiyār śrī-kāryam ceyyum atikārikaḷ maturānta suppliedka ventaveḷārum tiruviṭaimarutuṭaiyār tevaka
sabhaimpirāṭtiyārmāhavārakiyārkkāy tiruviṭaimarut’-uṭaiyārkku kaṇkāṇi-kaṇakku uṭaiyanampi na
yār koyilil kakūṭattey iruntu uṭaiyār tiruvolakkamāy irukkat teciy pāṭum kāśyapaṉ kaṇṭa ni
eḻupaṇaitevanukku ivaṉ teciyp pāṭa teciy pāṭuvaḵu muṉ kalaveṭṭiṉa nalam velipum ivaṉ eḻupaṇaitevaṉukkum ivaṉ anvayattārkkum
vaḻivaḻi candrādittaval ivaṉukku veli nilam nilan=tam ceytu kuṭukkaveṉṟu velāl ivaṉukku nivantañ ceyta nilamāvatu uṭaiyār tevatā
ṉam veṇṇāṭu viḷaṅkuṭic coṟuṭaiyāṉ pattar uḷḷiṭṭa veliyum in nilam veliyum ivaṉātal ivaṉ an=vayattār ātal oruvaṉey teciy pāṭiyu
nalluḻānvilaikoṇṭa munṉṟu māvu mivvūr ivaṉaiccukkum nāṉ vilaikoṇṭuṭaiya iruvlicceyyum tiruviṭaimarutil śrīmūlasthāna
Ivvūr nān eṭuppitta śrīkōyil paṭṭarkaḷukkum Ākka kuṭutten~kōpparakesaripaṉmaṟki yāṇṭu eḻātuvatuṉāḷ vaiykal sabhaiyāriṭaiya nāṉ iṟaikāval uṭaiya para
kuḷakkālil aṭai matirai-koṇṭa-kō-p-parakesaripaṉmaṟkki yāṇṭu 3 10 tāvatu veṇṇāṭṭu brahmadeyam vaiykalil sabhaiyom tiruvuṭaimarutil perumānṉ-aṭikaḷukku o
ricāvatu tiruviṭaimarutil talaikkolikkun tiruviṭaimarutil mahādevarkkum tiruviṭaimarutil talaikkoli viṇṇakar viṣṇukkaḷukkum āka nakkantalai
